Description: Last year to be modeled
cplex.opt file used
Specify column from inputs/userinput/region_spec.csv or from {column of hierarchy.csv}/{period-delimited entries to keep from that column}
Select natural gas supply curve (0 = cendiv, 1 = national + cendiv, 2 = static, 3 = national)
Turn on/off the representation of hydrogen supply/demand balance at a national level without storage (1) or at a regional level with storage (2)
Switch to turn on/off fuel cell techs
Turn on/off CO2 cap
Scenario for CO2 cap pathway (see inputs\emission_constraints\co2_cap.csv)
Specify whether to include non-CO2 GHGs in annual CO2 cap, changing it to a CO2(e) cap
Turn on/off BECCS technology
Specify the scenario used for the natural gas CRF penalty
Setting for distpv scenario (see inputs\dGen_model_inputs)

Battery cost and performance inputs (inputs\plant_characteristics\{batteryscen}.csv). The options for batteryscen start with 'battery_' and the switch should be set to the entire file name (ex: battery_ATB_2023_advanced)
Switch to turn on CSP capacity credit calculations
Annual discover rates for new geothermal sites
Geothermal cost setting (inputs\plant_characteristics\{geoscen}.csv).The options for geoscen start with 'geo_' and the switch should be set to the entire file name (ex: geo_ATB_2023_conservative)
Hydropower cost inputs (inputs/plant_characteristics/{hydroscen}.csv). The options for hydroscen start with 'hydro_' and the switch should be set to the entire file name (ex: hydro_ATB_2019_low)

UPV cost and performance inputs (inputs/plant_characteristics/{upvscen}.csv). The options for upvscen start with 'upv_' and the switch should be set to the entire file name (ex: upv_ATB_2023_advanced).

Onshore wind cost and performance inputs (inputs/plant_characteristics/{onswindscen}.csv). The options for ofswindscen start with 'ons-wind_' and the switch should be set to the entire file name (ex: ons-wind_ATB_2023_advanced).

Offshore wind cost and performance inputs (inputs/plant_characteristics/{ofswindscen}.csv). The options for ofswindscen start with 'ofs-wind_' and the switch should be set to the entire file name (ex: ofs-wind_ATB_2023_advanced)
Turn on/off switch to reduce the RE resource available
Specify the UPV siting scenario [reference, open, limited]
Specify the offshore wind siting scenario [open, limited]
Specify the onshore wind siting scenario [reference, open, limited, limitedplus]
Turn on/off all CCS
fuel cell deployment scenario (inputs\plant_characteristics)

Switch to choose EFS profiles - e.g. historic; EPREFERENCE; EPMEDIUM; EPHIGH; Clean2035; Clean2035clip1pct; Clean2035_LTS; EPMEDIUMStretch2046; EER_Baseline_AEO2022; EER_100by2050; EER_IRAmoderate; EER_IRAlow
H2 demand case as indicated by the column headers in inputs/consume/h2_exogenous_demand.csv
